<h3>From Javascript</h3>
    <div id="combo_zone3" style="width:200px; height:30px;"></div>
 
<script>
var z = dhtmlXComboFromSelect("combo_zone1");
var z = new dhtmlXCombo("combo_zone2", "alfa2", 200);
z.readonly(1);
z.loadXML("../common/data.xml");
 
var z = new dhtmlXCombo("combo_zone3", "alfa3", 200);
z.addOption([[1, 1111, "color:red"], [2, 2222], [3, 3333], [4, 4444], [5, 5555]]);
</script>
